title: em
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The <em> HTML element represents stressed text, such as emphasizing a word or phrase.

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: This example demonstrates the usage of the <em> tag with children elements.

usageExamples.title: Example 2
usageExamples.description: This example shows how to apply italic styling to a section of text using the <em> tag.
usageExamples.code: This is normal text This is emphasized text
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/p
	This is normal text 
	/em
		This is emphasized text
